Package lt.viko.ad.rdelinda.tinklai.data

package lt.viko.ad.rdelinda.tinklai.data
This package contains classes that represent data entities and utilities for handling XML-related tasks. The classes in this package are:
  • Account: Represents an account entity.
  • Student: Represents a student entity.
  • Subject: Represents a subject entity.
  • DTDUtil: Provides utilities for generating DTD schemas.
  • XMLUtil: Provides utilities for handling XML marshalling and unmarshalling.
  • XSDUtil: Provides utilities for generating XSD schemas.

Each entity class (Account, Student, Subject) contains attributes and methods to represent and manipulate the corresponding data entity. The utility classes (DTDUtil, XMLUtil, XSDUtil) provide methods to handle XML-related tasks such as generating DTD and XSD schemas, and marshalling/unmarshalling XML data.
